text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia deplexa, common name the unwoven pyramid-shell,  is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The length of the shell measures 3 mm.
text.Distribution: This endemic species occurs in the littoral zone and offshore  off Tasmania, and southern and southwestern Australia
